pkgmetadata.longdescription: Markov Regime Switching Copula Models Estimation and Goodness-of- Fit // Estimation procedures and goodness-of-fit test for several Markov regime switching models and mixtures of bivariate copula models. The goodness-of-fit test is based on a Cramer-von Mises statistic and uses Rosenblatt's transform and parametric bootstrap to estimate the p-value. The proposed methodologies are described in Nasri, Remillard and Thioub (2020) doi:10.1002/cjs.11534.
